title: La Paz
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Guatemalan, Latin American
description: Hotel and restaurant in San Marcos since 1993. Set in a lush garden at the upper trail between the two main paths, 2 properties from Paco Real. Offers 100% vegetarian menu with varying meals as well a set menu. Most dishes can be made vegan when requested. The hotel also offers yoga, massage, and other spiritual activities.
